sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Avatar, AppBar, Button, Card, CardContent, Icon, IconButton, List, ListItem, ListItemSecondaryAction, ListItemText, Toolbar, Typography} from '@material-ui/core'; import {FuseAnimateGroup} from '@fuse'; import axiosInstance from 'app/main/axios'; function CourseCard(props) { const [courseData,setCourseData]=React.useState(null) useEffect(() => { axiosInstance.get('get-course-offering-data/',{ params: { 'offeringId':props.offeringId?props.offeringId:1 } }).then(response => { console.log(response.data); setCourseData(response.data); }).catch(err=> { console.log(err); }) },[props]) return (
Course Details
Course Code {courseData?courseData.course.courseCode:null}
Course Name {courseData?courseData.course.courseName:null}
Offering Department Computer Science And Engineering
Course Status {courseData?courseData.offering.status:null}
Session {courseData?courseData.offering.session:null} Sem {courseData?courseData.offering.sem:null}
Section {courseData?courseData.offering.section:null}
Slot {courseData?courseData.offering.slot:null}
Instructors Details John Doe Roy Simmons Albert

Crediting Categorisation {courseData?courseData.categorization.map((value) => ( )):null}
); } export default CourseCard;
